# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the enumeration with the provided unsigned integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An unsigned integer that represents one of the text layout enumeration options.
title: init(rawValue:)
